name: Java CLI App
description: A simple Java command-line application using Maven.

tutorial.instruction: Familiarize yourself with the project structure. I've created a standard Maven layout with a `pom.xml` and a `src` directory. Use the `/ls` command to look around.
Now, add all the project files to the chat so the AI can see them.
This is a Maven project. The next step is to compile it. You can run shell commands using `/run`.
Now that it's compiled, run the application.
